The Médanos terroir has unique conditions ideal for quality vineyards. The soil is very rich, and given its latitude (around parallel 39º South, where the Pampa region and Patagonia converge) vineyards receive long hours of sun light, which result in grapes with high sugar contents. Windy springs help develop thicker skins that contribute to the intense color of these wines.

value: hours=open to the public for visits on week days and weekends

content=and winery, including wine tastings at the cellars and an opportunity to buy wines at wholesale prices. Offers high quality wines including Malbec, Cabernet Sauvignon, Merlot, Tannat, Chardonnay and Sauvignon Blanc under the Al Este and Terrasabbia brands. The vineyard and winery with state of the art infrastructure and technology including the wine cellar where wines are aged in French and American oak.
